alert.note: Alert for Dane; Dodge; Jefferson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 2:46PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Dane, northwestern Jefferson and southwestern Dodge Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 245 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Ripley, or 8 miles southwest of Lake Mills, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Watertown, Lake Mills, Waterloo, Johnson Creek, Deerfield, Cambridge, Lake Ripley, Lake Koshkonong, Milford, Richwood, Rockdale, and Hubbleton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 39/90 near mile marker 154. Interstate 94 between mile markers 252 and 266. Wisconsin Highway 26 between mile markers 37 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
